description: Technical support lead implementing physician practice management systems across medical facilities in the northeastern corridor.
achievements: Implemented physician practice management systems across medical facilities in the northeastern corridor
Technical support lead in the Philadelphia area supporting over 50 medical facilities
Provided support for AIX, SCO UNIX OpenServer, Red Hat Enterprise Linux, Solaris, and Windows Server 2000/2003
Connected branch medical offices using VPN, Frame Relay, PPP, and Leased Lines with Cisco and SonicWall routers
Managed Active Directory installations at medical facilities
Trained on HIPAA and PCI compliance for operating system controls and auditing
